body_html: This Wide and Deep tutorial looks really interesting, it makes use of tf.contrib.layers.embedding_column, which doesn't seem to be part of tensorflow yet. Is the code for the embedding column going to be added or made available somewhere else?
body_text: This Wide and Deep tutorial looks really interesting, it makes use of tf.contrib.layers.embedding_column, which doesn't seem to be part of tensorflow yet. Is the code for the embedding column going to be added or made available somewhere else?
body: This Wide and Deep tutorial looks really interesting, it makes use of `tf.contrib.layers.embedding_column`, which doesn't seem to be part of tensorflow yet. Is the code for the embedding column going to be added or made available somewhere else?
